code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Button}from'primereact/button';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Accueil(){const[showLogin,setShowLogin]=useState(false);const[showRegister,setShowRegister]=useState(false);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-d-flex p-flex-column p-ai-center accueil-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Bienvenue sur AMBY"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"AMBY est une plateforme collaborative pour les jeunes entrepreneurs."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-d-flex p-jc-center p-mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{label:"Connexion",icon:"pi pi-sign-in",className:"p-button-primary p-mr-2",onClick:()=>setShowLogin(true)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{label:"Inscription",icon:"pi pi-user-plus",className:"p-button-success",onClick:()=>setShowRegister(true)})]}),showLogin&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-modal",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modal-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{icon:"pi pi-times",onClick:()=>setShowLogin(false)})})}),showRegister&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"register-modal",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modal-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{icon:"pi pi-times",onClick:()=>setShowRegister(false)})})})]});}export default Accueil;
